channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- TaxoPress – Create and Manage Taxonomies, Tags, Categories
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- TaxoPress – Create and Manage Taxonomies, Tags, Categories

item.title: CVE-2021-24444|2024-08-03T19:28:23.965Z -- unknown -- taxopress%20%E2%80%93%20create%20and%20manage%20taxonomies%2C%20tags%2C%20categories
item.description: The TaxoPress – Create and Manage Taxonomies, Tags, Categories WordPress plugin before 3.0.7.2 does not sanitise its Taxonomy description field, allowing high privilege users to set JavaScript payload in them even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed, leading to an authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue.
